text: 2011 local election results in Liverpool The Liverpool Council election, 2011 to the city of Liverpool council happened on the same day as the 2011 United Kingdom local elections and the 2011 United Kingdom Alternative Vote referendum on 5 May. Councillors elected at the 2007 Liverpool Council election defended their seats this year.
